title: Postal Receipts for Germany
notes:
Series Is Presented Here As Two Variables--(1)--Original Data, 1875-1914 (2)--Original Data, 1919-1923. Figures For April-May, 1919 And April, 1920 Do Not Include Wurtenburg And Bavaria. Source: Reichsministerium Des Innern, Monthly Issues Of Zentralblatt Fur Das Deutsche Reich.

This NBER data series m15008b appears on the NBER website in Chapter 15 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter15.html.

NBER Indicator: m15008b
